name: LeviosaMotorShades
0:
”Alexa, tell Leviosa raise my kitchen shades”
”Alexa, tell Leviosa open deck”
”Alexa, tell Leviosa close office”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: leviosa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa can now raise and lower your Leviosa Motor Shades with voice commands. Actions are: raise, lower, or stop your shades, or open, close to bypass any set midpoints. Specify actions by shade groups/rooms, shade zones/areas, or locations/networks.
Requirements: You must already have a Leviosa Zone controller, as well as have setup an active account with "Leviosa Motor Shades" App from either Apple Play store of Google Play store.
